content: I'm helping to update the Rust version provided by Void Linux to 1.52.1 from 1.48.0. The packaging process used to invoke tests categorized as "compile-fail" and "run-fail", which no longer seem to exist. Can anyone tell me if those tests were re-categorized sometime between 1.48.0 and 1.52.1?
@cinerea0 They have all moved to the UI test suite (src/test/ui)
